verses.name: Matthew 21:9
verses.text: And the multitudes that went before, and that followed, cried, saying, Hosanna to the Son of David: Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord; Hosanna in the highest.

verses.name: Matthew 21:10
verses.text: And when he was come into Jerusalem, all the city was moved, saying, Who is this?

verses.name: Matthew 21:11
verses.text: And the multitude said, This is Jesus the prophet of Nazareth of Galilee.

verses.name: Matthew 21:12
verses.text: And Jesus went into the temple of God, and cast out all them that sold and bought in the temple, and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers, and the seats of them that sold doves,
